name: Cooke's Crating & Fine Arts Transportation
description: Cooke's Crating provides high-security fine art storage in Los Angeles with 65,000 sq ft of climate-controlled space and 35,000 sq ft of non-climate storage. Features include 24/7 monitoring, video surveillance, and barcode inventory tracking.

itemOffered.name: Climate-Controlled Art Storage
itemOffered.description: Temperature and humidity regulated storage spanning 65,000 square feet for sensitive artworks.

itemOffered.name: Secure Non-Climate Storage
itemOffered.description: 35,000 square feet of secure, non-climate controlled storage space.

itemOffered.name: Inventory Management
itemOffered.description: Barcode-labeled tracking with robust server and cloud backups.

itemOffered.name: 24/7 Security Monitoring
itemOffered.description: Central Station monitored burglar/fire alarms and video surveillance with 30-day recording.

review.reviewBody: Kevin was fantastic to work with and was a great help in making all of shipping and packing arrangements go smoothly.
Many thanks to Dave and Keenan for their help. I work with art handlers across the country and was impressed with their knowledge and professionalism in handling my client's art work.
